description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of a by 0, and add proper error handling for division by zero with a clear error message. This prevents ZeroDivisionError and makes the function more robust. - Fix the division operation to use b instead of 0, and add error handling for division by zero

metadata.solution_description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of a by 0, and add proper error handling for division by zero with a clear error message. This prevents ZeroDivisionError and makes the function more robust.
